44401.「こ…こんにちは。私は ここで\n 駅弁売りの お仕事をしています……。\n ひ:
Hello, I am a train station vendor here. I work here as a train station lunch box vendor. Are you buying a
lunch box by any chance?

44402.「そうでしたか。\n それなら いいのです……。: Is that so? That's all right then.

44403.「ごめんなさい。お弁当 売り切れなんです……。\n も……文句がおありなら ホー:
Sorry, lunch box is sold out. If you have any complaints, please talk to Hollow, the old man with the dull
eyes! He always buys up all the lunch boxes with his cute face.

105635.「が…岳都ガタラ駅へ ようこそ。\n この度 駅員として働くことになったのですが:
Welcome to Gatara Station. I have just started working as a train station employee, but there are many things I
don't understand, and I am learning day by day.
